metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsFist Larche (PLEASE RENAME TO THIS] overseeing scanning of civilians

0.speaker: Fist Larche
0.text: That Watcher is down, and I'd wager it isn't getting up again. I'd give up on it, if it was up to me.

1.speaker: Fist Larche
1.text: As you can see, there's no trouble here, right? And I'm sure you don't want to cause any.
